patthana4.6:5.1: Akusalaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:6.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.6:8.1: Kusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:9.1: Akusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:10.1: Abyākataṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:11.1: Kusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:12.1: Akusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ, avigate nava.
patthana4.6:14.1: Kusalo nokileso dhammo kusalassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:15.1: Abyākato nokileso dhammo abyākatassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:16.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.6:19.1: Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:20.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:21.1: Abyākataṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:22.1: Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:23.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:24.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.6:26.1: Kusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:27.1: Akusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:28.1: Abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:29.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.6:30.1: Kusalaṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:31.1: Abyākataṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:32.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana4.6:34.1: Kusalo asaṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.6:35.1: Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.6:36.1: Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:36.2: Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:37.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve … pe … upanissaye cattāri … pe … kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana4.6:41.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:42.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.6:44.1: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:44.2: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:44.3: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭho ca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana4.6:45.1: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:45.2: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhañca abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #2
patthana4.6:46.1: Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:47.1: Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.6:48.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana4.6:50.1: Kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:51.1: Abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.6:52.1: Kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana4.6:53.1: Abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana4.6:54.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana4.6:58.1: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:61.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:64.1: Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:65.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:66.1: Abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:67.1: Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:68.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:69.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.6:71.1: Kusalo saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo kusalassa saṃkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:72.1: Abyākato saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo abyākatassa saṃkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:73.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.6:76.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṃkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:77.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.6:79.1: Akusalaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:84.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:87.1: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:92.1: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:92.2: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:92.3: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko ca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana4.6:93.1: Abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.6:94.1: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikañca abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:95.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana4.6:97.1: Kusalo kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:98.1: Abyākato kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.6:99.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri … pe … avigate satta.

patthana4.6:102.1: Hetuyā dve … pe … āsevane vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana4.6:104.1: Kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana4.6:106.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve … pe … upanissaye cattāri … pe … kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
